EmailTemplate.name: Dec6Web:Career-Change.Reminder Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: 3 Principles to Guide Your Independent Transition
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
We would like to remind you that you can join us On Dec 6th at 1pm EST for our free webinar: <http://info.mbopartners.com/Sept18WebProposals.html>From Burned Out to Fired Up: 3 Principles to Guide Your Independent Transition <http://info.mbopartners.com/Dec6Web_Career-Change.html>.
You'll hear Ingrid Sarrat of My Coaching Circle <http://www.mycoachingcircle.com/>, a certified Transition, Career and Life Coach, explain the concept of emotional intelligence (EQ), and how you can apply its principles to help your independent business take off.
Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/Dec6Web_Career-Change.html> to get started on the path to independence!
___________________________________ MBO Partners t: 1-800-220-0469 e: info@mbopartners.com <mailto:info@mbopartners.com>
